description:
This regression was introduced following bug #882742
It was noticed when deltacloud could not connect via the v1.0 API as detailed:
https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=783878

I'll send a patch momentarily.
title: Invalid X-Server-Management-Url returned for v1.0 API noauth requests without an X-Auth-Token

comments.content:
This regression was introduced following bug #882742
It was noticed when deltacloud could not connect via the v1.0 API as detailed:
https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=783878

I'll send a patch momentarily.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~p-draigbrady

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: stable/diablo
Review: https://review.openstack.org/3303
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: Only applies to Diablo since v1.0 isn't supported in Essex

    Bug #920497 fix X-Server-Management-Url for v1.0 noauth API

    which discounted the v1.0 case
